snippet.title: Farmwand - Wishlist now on Steam
snippet.description:
Farmwand is an upcoming cozy game full of adventure, magic and lovable characters! 

Build your dream house and your own magical farm with dozens of crops, animals and flowers at your disposal. Decorate with hundreds of items and explore a vast land where you can find mysteries around every corner, friends in every town, and romance in the most unexpected places.

Wishlist it now on Steam : 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1836840/Farmwand/

Support its development on Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/FarmwandGame

Official website :
https://www.farmwand.com

And follow us on our social media

X (Twitter) : https://twitter.com/FarmwandGame
Reddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/Farmwand/
BlueSky : https://bsky.app/profile/farmwandgame.bsky.social
TikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@farmwand_official
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/farmwand/

The soundtrack of Farmwand was composed by Sean McRoberts 
https://twitter.com/seanmcro

#farmwand #game #indie #gaming #cozy #cozygames #fantasy #magic #steam #autumn #halloween
